pr_title: Make byte array data accessor use RealmAwareZkClient

timeline.message:
Make byte array data accessor use RealmAwareZkClient

This change was left out of the ZooScalability migration of helix-rest, making ZooKeeperAccessor endpoints fail in a multi-zk setting. This change fixes this.

timeline.bodyText: Just have one suggestion. There are many duplicated pieces with previous function. Can we abstract it as a private function and called in both public method?
timeline.author: junkaixue

replies.bodyText: +1, the only difference is the serializer, right?
replies.author: jiajunwang

replies.bodyText: I agree with the suggestions made here. This PR has been updated with the refactor. @jiajunwang the serializer is not the only thing that differs, but I pulled some trick to make it work to cut down on duplication.
